error.message: Parameter $event of method Drupal\acquia_purge\EventSubscriber\CacheableResponseSubscriber::onRespond() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Event\FilterResponseEvent: since Symfony 4.3, use ResponseEvent instead
The "app.root" service is deprecated in drupal:9.0.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use the app.root parameter instead. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3080612
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.9 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.9 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
